Name: Larcenauts Spectator Mode
About the game: View all of the action in Larcenauts, the top VR hero shooter, in full screen and full resolution on your PC monitor. Perfect for viewing Larcenauts competitions or getting the highest quality video for streaming. Easy to use interface get's you right in the action so that you can see everything going on in a Larcenauts match. Features Include: ✦ Full screen, full resolution, spectator view ✦ Easily find friends in Larcenauts and spectate their games ✦ Use the Spectator code to watch private competition games. ✦ Spectate from multiple camera locations in the map or use the follow camera to follow specific players Want to get in on the action? Add Larcenauts to your game library and join the competition. /
